trans-unit.source: Organizes style characteristics of an ASP.NET mobile control.
trans-unit.target: 組織 ASP.NET 行動控制項的樣式特性。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The base Style class contains style characteristics common to all mobile controls.
trans-unit.target: 基底樣式類別含有通用於所有行動控制項的樣式特性。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from the Style class contain additional style characteristics specific to their associated control.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自樣式類別包含其相關聯控制項的特定的其他樣式特性。

trans-unit.source: Due to the diversity of devices supported by mobile controls, all style properties are advisory, and might or might not be honored depending on the capabilities of the target device.
trans-unit.target: 支援的行動控制項裝置多樣化，因為所有的樣式屬性諮詢，且可能會或可能不會遵照視目標裝置的功能而定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific*> property to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific*>屬性指定的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The AddParsedSubObject method does not support multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific> objects and will throw an <xref:System.Exception> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific%2A> property is not `null` when AddParsedSubObject is called.
trans-unit.target: AddParsedSubObject 方法不支援多個<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific>物件，並將會擲回<xref:System.Exception>如果<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific%2A>屬性不是`null`AddParsedSubObject 呼叫時。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecific>

trans-unit.source: The object to be set as the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific*>.
trans-unit.target: 要設定做為<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific*>值的物件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific*> property is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific*>屬性不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.DeviceSpecific*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified alignment for the style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定的對齊樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The Alignment property can be set to any of the following values: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName>|No alignment is set for the specified object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName>|Aligns to the left.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName>|Aligns to the center.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName>|Aligns to the right.|
trans-unit.target: [對齊] 屬性可以設定為下列值之一: |值 |描述 | |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName>|沒有對齊設定為指定的物件。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName>|靠左對齊。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName>|置中對齊。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName>|靠右對齊。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value representing the specified alignment for the style.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值，表示指定的對齊樣式。

trans-unit.source: Represents the key used to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Alignment*> setting of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表用來擷取的索引鍵<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Alignment*>設定<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style"> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Alignment*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Applies the properties of a style to a control.
trans-unit.target: 適用於控制項的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The following control properties are affected: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Size%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|The size of the font.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|Whether the font is bold.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|Whether the font is italic.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|The foreground color.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|The background color.|
trans-unit.target: 受影響控制項的下列屬性: |屬性 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Size%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|字型的大小。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|字型是否使用粗體顯示。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|字型是否使用斜體。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|前景色彩。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|背景色彩。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Size%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The control to which the style properties are applied.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的樣式屬性會套用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified background color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定的背景色彩樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other properties, the BackColor property is not inherited from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 不同於其他屬性，BackColor 屬性不被繼承自其父代。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the BackColor property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's `BackColor` property to cyan, or you must set the BackColor property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果父控制項的 BackColor 屬性設青色中，子控制項不會繼承青色; 的背景色彩您必須明確設定子控制項的`BackColor`屬性到青色、 或者您必須將父控制項的 BackColor 屬性設定並套用至子控制項的樣式表。

trans-unit.source: This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.
trans-unit.target: 這是與階層式樣式表的行為一致。

trans-unit.source: The specified background color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 指定的背景色彩樣式。

trans-unit.source: The key for retrieving the style from the embedded style sheet for <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: 擷取內嵌的樣式表樣式的索引鍵<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor*>

trans-unit.source: This property returns the control that is the container for the specified style.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回為容器指定樣式的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯控制項的強型別的參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the DeviceSpecific/Choice construct associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與控制項關聯的 DeviceSpecific/Choice 建構。

trans-unit.source: The accessor returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no such construct exists.
trans-unit.target: 存取子會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有這類建構存在。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: The DeviceSpecific/Choice construct associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 與控制項關聯的 DeviceSpecific/Choice 建構。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo"></xref> object that contains font information about the control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo"></xref>物件，其中包含有關控制項的字型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo> class has the following properties: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|Whether the font is bold.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|Whether the font is italic.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|An identifier for this font instance.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Size%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|The font size.|
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>類別具有下列屬性: |屬性 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|字型是否使用粗體顯示。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|字型是否使用斜體。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|這個字型的執行個體的識別項。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Size%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|字型大小。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Size%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Italic%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo.Bold%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo>

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value specifying the font information about the control.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值，指定控制項的字型資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified foreground color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樣式的指定的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this property sets the color for the text.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這個屬性會設定文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ForeColor property to display text in different colors.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的前景色彩屬性可在不同的色彩顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: The strings that can be used for colors are a set of fixed colors and hexadecimal RGB values.
trans-unit.target: 可用的色彩的字串會是一組固定的色彩和十六進位 RGB 值。

trans-unit.source: These values can also be specified as "#bb7023".
trans-unit.target: 這些值也可以指定為"#bb7023"。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the Microsoft Windows color constants.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 Microsoft Windows 色彩常數。

trans-unit.source: The specified foreground color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 指定的前景色彩樣式。

trans-unit.source: The key for retrieving the style from the embedded style sheet for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.ForeColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: 擷取內嵌的樣式表樣式的索引鍵<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.ForeColor*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the template with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有指定名稱的範本。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Returns `null` if the control is not templated, or if the template does not exist in the selected template set.
trans-unit.target: 傳回`null`如果控制項不是樣板，或如果範本不存在於選取的範本設定。

trans-unit.source: The template with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名稱的範本。

trans-unit.source: To be considered templated, an object must have a [\<DeviceSpecific>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element with a `<Choice>` element successfully evaluated for the target device.
trans-unit.target: 若要考慮到樣板化，物件必須有[ \<DeviceSpecific >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)具有項目`<Choice>`成功評估的目標裝置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The selected choice must have templates defined.
trans-unit.target: 選取的選項必須有定義的範本。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the style has an active template set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.IsTrackingViewState%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.IsTrackingViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它也會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>所參考物件<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.State%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.State%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified wrapping mode for the style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樣式的指定文繞圖模式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The following table contains the definitions of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping> enumerations.
trans-unit.target: 下表包含的定義<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping>列舉型別。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping>

trans-unit.source: |Enumeration|Value|Description| |-----------------|-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping?displayProperty=fullName>|0|No size is set for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: |列舉型別 |值 |描述 | |-----------------|-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping?displayProperty=fullName>|0|沒有大小設定為指定的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping?displayProperty=fullName>|1|Wrap to the next line.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping?displayProperty=fullName>|2|The text is not wrapped to the next line.|
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping?displayProperty=fullName>|1|自動換行至下一行。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping?displayProperty=fullName>|2|文字不換行至下一行。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value that specifies the wrapping mode for the style.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值，指定樣式的文繞圖模式。

trans-unit.source: The key for retrieving the style from the embedded style sheet for <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Wrapping*>.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Wrapping*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Wrapping*>內嵌的樣式表樣式的索引鍵

trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 內部使用。
